item.description:
Due to Percona Live: MySQL Conference and Expo falling on 4/10-4/12, we will be having an informal meeting on TUESDAY, April 3rd.

We will be meeting at John Harvard's in Harvard Square, Cambridge. It is very close to the Harvard Square subway/bus stop, and there are parking garages nearby.

This is a pay-your-own-way dinner, starting at 6:30 pm. You don't *have* to order anything, and there's no set topic - we are just going to be social.

Please RSVP so we have an accurate headcount to make a reservation, but it's OK if you don't RSVP but want to show up.
item.name: The Boston MySQL Meetup Group Monthly Meetup
